metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart tries to call one of the camp pets over. Part of some behaviours Shadowheart's softer side, that kick in as the story progresses to hint that she may be swayed from Shar/be denying her true natue.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: What do you get up to all day without us, hmm?
0.context: NodeContext: Beckoning over Scratch, the camp dog.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Now, play nice... claws and beak to yourself, please...
1.context: NodeContext: Beckoning over the camp's owlbear cub (wild/potentially dangerous when fully grown, but cute for now)
